attributes.action: Give knighthood to Samir Zitouni and Stephen Crean.
attributes.additional_details: Because if someone really deserves knighthood, its them.
attributes.background: Recognise heroizm of those who really stood up for community.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
